title: Ticket #4807: Startd slots stuck in Preemtping/Killing state forever
description:
If the a schedd older than v8.3.2 runs a job against a v8.3.2 startd, and that schedd disappears, upon expiration of the job_lease_time the slot will enter Preempting/Killing forever instead of switching back to Unclaimed like it should. Note this bug first appeared in v8.3.2, and also this bug is not triggered if the schedd involved is also running v8.3.2.

This bug was introduced in ticket #4491.
